name: post_check_r6
description: This table stores information about compliance checks performed on transactions, including rules applied and processing times.

columns.name: sym_run_date
columns.description: The date when the compliance check was executed.

columns.name: dlh_source
columns.description: The source system from which the data was obtained.

columns.name: year
columns.description: The year when the compliance check was performed.

columns.name: month
columns.description: The month when the compliance check was performed.

columns.name: day
columns.description: The day when the compliance check was performed.

columns.name: rule_code
columns.description: The code representing the specific compliance rule applied.

columns.name: rule_name
columns.description: The name of the compliance rule applied.

columns.name: reference_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the compliance check record.

columns.name: count_kyc_id_in_1_day
columns.description: The number of Know Your Customer (KYC) IDs processed in one day.

columns.name: payload
columns.description: The detailed data or message content associated with the compliance check.

columns.name: dlh_created_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the compliance check record was created.

columns.name: dlh_processed_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the compliance check record was processed.
